languages.text: {n}Октавиана кивает, набирает полную грудь воздуха и громогласно орет:{/n} "Эй, дармоеды, бездельники и прохиндеи, а ну заткнулись живо! {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость {name} фон Валанциус, любезно изволивш{mf|ий|ая} почтить нас своим благородным присутствием, сейчас будет говорить!" {n}Все в зале затихают в ожидании, глядя на вас.{/n}

{n}Octaviana nods, fills her lungs with air, and yells out in a booming voice,{/n} "Hey, you! Bums, layabouts, and crooks, shut your traps! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, who has graciously honoured us with {mf|his|her} presence today, is about to speak!" {n}The bar quiets down, and all eyes turn to you expectantly.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Октавиана кивает, набирает полную грудь воздуха и громогласно орет:{/n} "Эй, дармоеды, бездельники и прохиндеи, а ну заткнулись живо! {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость {name} фон Валанциус, любезно изволивш{mf|ий|ая} почтить нас своим благородным присутствием, сейчас будет говорить!" {n}Все в зале затихают в ожидании, глядя на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana nods, fills her lungs with air, and yells out in a booming voice,{/n} "Hey, you bums, layabouts, and crooks, shut your holes this instant! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, who has graciously honoured us with {mf|his|her} presence today, is about to speak!" {n}The bar quiets down, and all eyes turn to you expectantly.{/n}

{n}Octaviana nods, fills her lungs with air, and yells out in a booming voice,{/n} "Hey, you! Bums, layabouts, and crooks, shut your traps! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, who has graciously honoured us with {mf|his|her} presence today, is about to speak!" {n}The bar quiets down, and all eyes turn to you expectantly.{/n}

languages.text: {n}オクタヴィアナは頷き、目いっぱい空気を吸うと、良く響く声で叫ぶ。{/n}「ほら、あんたたち！役立たず、怠け者、ペテン師ども黙りな！今日寛大にも私たちに同席する名誉をくださった{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下が、これからお話をなさるんだからね！」{n}バーが静まり返り、全員があなたに期待に満ちたまなざしを向ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana nods, fills her lungs with air, and yells out in a booming voice,{/n} "Hey, you! Bums, layabouts, and crooks, shut your traps! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, who has graciously honoured us with {mf|his|her} presence today, is about to speak!" {n}The bar quiets down, and all eyes turn to you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}オクタヴィアナは頷き、目いっぱい空気を吸うと、良く響く声で叫ぶ。{/n}「ほら、あんたたち！役立たず、怠け者、ペテン師ども黙りな！今日寛大にも私たちに同席する名誉をくださった{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下が、これからお話をなさるんだからね！」{n}バーが静まり返り、全員があなたに期待に満ちたまなざしを向ける。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Octaviana hoche la tête, prend une grande inspiration et hurle d'une voix tonitruante :{/n} « Hé, les bouseux, les feignants et les escrocs ! Fermez-la un peu ! Sa Seigneurie {name} von Valancius, qui nous fait l'honneur de sa présence aujourd'hui, a un truc à vous dire ! » {n}Le bar se tait et tous les regards se tournent vers vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana nods, fills her lungs with air, and yells out in a booming voice,{/n} "Hey, you! Bums, layabouts, and crooks, shut your traps! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, who has graciously honoured us with {mf|his|her} presence today, is about to speak!" {n}The bar quiets down, and all eyes turn to you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana hoche la tête, prend une grande inspiration et hurle d'une voix tonitruante :{/n} « Hé, les bouseux, les feignants et les escrocs ! Fermez-la un peu ! Sa Seigneurie {name} von Valancius, qui nous fait l'honneur de sa présence aujourd'hui, a un truc à vous dire ! » {n}Le bar se tait et tous les regards se tournent vers vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}奥克塔维娜点了点头，猛吸一口气，以洪亮的声音高喊起来。{/n}“嘿，说你们呢！你们这群无赖、骗子、乞丐，赶紧闭嘴吧！{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯大人今天大驾光临，让这间小破酒吧蓬荜生辉！大人现在有话要说！”{n}酒吧里安静下来，所有人都带着期待的目光，看着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana nods, fills her lungs with air, and yells out in a booming voice,{/n} "Hey, you! Bums, layabouts, and crooks, shut your traps! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, who has graciously honoured us with {mf|his|her} presence today, is about to speak!" {n}The bar quiets down, and all eyes turn to you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}奥克塔维娜点了点头，猛吸一口气，以洪亮的声音高喊起来。{/n}“嘿，说你们呢！你们这群无赖、骗子、乞丐，赶紧闭嘴吧！{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯大人今天大驾光临，让这间小破酒吧蓬荜生辉！大人现在有话要说！”{n}酒吧里安静下来，所有人都带着期待的目光，看着你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Octaviana nickt, holt tief Luft und schreit mit gewaltiger Stimme:{/n} "Hey, Ihr! Rumtreiber, Faulpelze und Gauner, haltet sofort den Mund! {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} {name} von Valancius, {mf|der uns heute mit seiner|die uns heute mit ihrer} Anwesenheit beehrt, möchte etwas sagen!" {n}In der Bar wird es ruhig, und alle Augen sind erwartungsvoll auf dich gerichtet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana nods, fills her lungs with air, and yells out in a booming voice,{/n} "Hey, you! Bums, layabouts, and crooks, shut your traps! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, who has graciously honoured us with {mf|his|her} presence today, is about to speak!" {n}The bar quiets down, and all eyes turn to you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana nickt, holt tief Luft und schreit mit gewaltiger Stimme:{/n} "Hey, Ihr! Rumtreiber, Faulpelze und Gauner, haltet sofort den Mund! {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} {name} von Valancius, {mf|der uns heute mit seiner|die uns heute mit ihrer} Anwesenheit beehrt, möchte etwas sagen!" {n}In der Bar wird es ruhig, und alle Augen sind erwartungsvoll auf dich gerichtet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Octaviana asiente, inspira profundamente y grita en voz alta con fuerza:{/n} «¡Eh, vosotros! ¡Holgazanes, parásitos y delincuentes, cerrad el pico un momento! ¡{mf|Lord|Lady} {name} von Valancius, ha tenido la amabilidad de honrarnos con su presencia hoy, y va a decir unas palabras!». {n}Toda la gente del bar se queda en silencio y, expectantes, dirigen sus miradas a ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana nods, fills her lungs with air, and yells out in a booming voice,{/n} "Hey, you! Bums, layabouts, and crooks, shut your traps! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, who has graciously honoured us with {mf|his|her} presence today, is about to speak!" {n}The bar quiets down, and all eyes turn to you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana asiente, inspira profundamente y grita en voz alta con fuerza:{/n} «¡Eh, vosotros! ¡Holgazanes, parásitos y delincuentes, cerrad el pico un momento! ¡{mf|Lord|Lady} {name} von Valancius, ha tenido la amabilidad de honrarnos con su presencia hoy, y va a decir unas palabras!». {n}Toda la gente del bar se queda en silencio y, expectantes, dirigen sus miradas a ti.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Octaviana başını sallıyor, ciğerlerini havayla doldurup gürleyen sesiyle bağırıyor.{/n} "Herkes dinlesin! Serseriler, aylaklar, sahtekarlar, hepiniz susun! Bugün varlığıyla bizi onurlandıran {mf|Lord|Leydi} {name} von Valancius Hazretleri konuşacak!" {n}Bar sessizliğe bürünüyor, tüm gözler beklenti içinde sana dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana nods, fills her lungs with air, and yells out in a booming voice,{/n} "Hey, you! Bums, layabouts, and crooks, shut your traps! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, who has graciously honoured us with {mf|his|her} presence today, is about to speak!" {n}The bar quiets down, and all eyes turn to you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana başını sallıyor, ciğerlerini havayla doldurup gürleyen sesiyle bağırıyor.{/n} "Herkes dinlesin! Serseriler, aylaklar, sahtekarlar, hepiniz susun! Bugün varlığıyla bizi onurlandıran {mf|Lord|Leydi} {name} von Valancius Hazretleri konuşmak üzere!" {n}Bar sessizliğe bürünüyor ve tüm gözler beklenti içinde sana dönüyor.{/n}
